page.title: 16A VISIT TO A FARM
page.content: We went to visit the local farm. The farmhouse was very old,C16, it was a listed building. First we saw the farm machinery in the big barn. There was a combine harvester, four tractors,a spinner, a dumper, a bailer, a three furrow plough and a fork lift truck. The farm is 65 acres. It has 4 cows and we saw a calf that was only a week old. We went in the milking parlour. They milk 6.00am in the morning and 5.00pm. We went to see the fields of oats and barley and wheat. We also picked some oil plants with nice yellow flowers, these were for margerine. The farmer said he could plough an acre an hour. We saw lots of chickens, they made a lot of noise. The farmer gave us an egg each to take home. I had mine for tea with chips and beans.
